name.ar: ألعاب جانبية - العب ألعاب صغيرة في اللوحة الجانبية
name.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Side Games - play side panel mini games
name.es: Juegos Laterales - mini juegos en panel
name.fil: Mga Mini-Laro - maglaro sa side panel
name.fr: Jeux latéraux - mini-jeux dans le panneau
name.hi: साइड गेम्स - साइड पैनल मिनी गेम्स खेलें
name.id: Permainan Samping - mini game di panel
name.it: Giochi Laterali - mini giochi nel pannello
name.ja: サイドゲーム - サイドパネルのミニゲームをプレイ
name.ko: 사이드 게임 - 사이드 패널 미니 게임 플레이
name.pt_BR: Jogos Laterais - jogue minijogos no painel lateral
name.vi: Trò chơi phụ - mini games trong bảng điều khiển
name.zh_CN: 侧边游戏 - 在侧边栏玩迷你游戏
name.zh_TW: 側邊遊戲 - 在側邊欄玩迷你遊戲

short.ar: العب أكثر من مئة لعبة صغيرة في لوحة جانبية لمتصفحك!
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play over a HUNDRED mini games on your browser side panel!
short.de: Spielen Sie über HUNDERT Mini-Spiele in Ihrem Browser-Seitenpanel!
short.es: ¡Juega más de CIEN mini juegos en el panel lateral de tu navegador!
short.fil: Maglaro ng mahigit sa ISANG DAANG mini laro sa iyong browser side panel!
short.fr: Jouez à plus d'une CENTAINE de mini-jeux dans le panneau latéral de votre navigateur !
short.hi: अपने ब्राउज़र साइड पैनल पर एक से अधिक सौ मिनी गेम्स खेलें!
short.id: Mainkan lebih dari SERATUS mini game di panel samping browser Anda!
short.it: Gioca a oltre CENTO mini giochi nel pannello laterale del tuo browser!
short.ja: ブラウザのサイドパネルで100以上のミニゲームをプレイしましょう！
short.ko: 브라우저 사이드 패널에서 100개 이상의 미니 게임을 플레이하세요!
short.pt_BR: Jogue mais de CEM minijogos no painel lateral do seu navegador!
short.vi: Chơi hơn trăm trò chơi mini trong bảng điều khiển bên của trình duyệt của bạn!
short.zh_CN: 在您的浏览器侧边栏玩超过一百种迷你游戏！
short.zh_TW: 在您的瀏覽器側邊欄玩超過一百款迷你遊戲！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Welcome to Side Games - Your Ultimate Boredom Buster!

Unleash a world of excitement with our web extension packed with 💯s of FREE games right at your fingertips! 🎮

🌐 Endless Entertainment in Your Chrome Side Panel!
Click the icon on your toolbar, open the Side Panel, and dive into a gaming paradise. No more boredom, just non-stop fun! 🎉

🎁 A Game for Every Mood!
From thrilling adventures to brain-teasing puzzles, we've got it all. Explore a diverse collection that guarantees excitement whenever you need it. 🧩🚀

🌈 Brighten Your Bored Moments!
Feeling bored? Let Side Games turn your dull moments into a gaming extravaganza. Instant play, endless joy! 🌟😄

🚨 Key Features:
- Hundreds of FREE Games: Variety is our middle name! Discover games that suit every taste and mood.
- Chrome Side Panel Integration: Easy access for quick gaming sessions without leaving your browser.
- Boredom Be Gone: Say goodbye to monotony and hello to excitement with a single click.

🎮 How to Play:
1. Click the toolbar icon.
2. Open the Side Panel.
3. Choose your game and let the fun begin!

Get ready for a gaming revolution! Install Side Games now and turn your browser into a playground of endless possibilities. 🕹️🌐

Download for FREE and let the games begin! 🚀🎁
